languages.text: {n}Толпа придвигается ближе, и Топка, возвысив голос, кричит:{/n} "Слышите?! Им нечего ответить нам! Мы — правы!"
{n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа придвигается ближе, и Топка, возвысив голос, кричит:{/n} "Слышите?! Им нечего ответить нам! Мы — правы!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd draws closer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs:{/n} "Do you hear me?! They have nothing to say! Even they admit we are right!"
{n}The crowd draws closer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs:{/n} "Do you hear me?! They have nothing to say! Even they admit we are right!"

{n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"

languages.text: {n}Die Masse rückt näher, und Glutofen schreit so laut wie möglich:{/n} "Hört Ihr? Sie haben nichts zu sagen! Sogar sie wissen, dass wir recht haben!"
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Masse rückt näher, und Glutofen schreit so laut wie möglich:{/n} "Hört Ihr? Sie haben nichts zu sagen! Sogar sie wissen, dass wir recht haben!"

languages.text: {n}La muchedumbre se acerca y Horno grita a pleno pulmón:{/n} «¿Lo oís? ¡No tienen nada que decir! ¡Hasta ellos saben que tenemos razón!».
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La muchedumbre se acerca y Horno grita a pleno pulmón:{/n} «¿Lo oís? ¡No tienen nada que decir! ¡Hasta ellos saben que tenemos razón!».

languages.text: {n}群衆が近づいて、ファーネスは声を張り上げて叫ぶ。{/n}「聞いたか？何も言うことがないんだよ！奴らも俺たちが正しいことは分かっている！」
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆が近づいて、ファーネスは声を張り上げて叫ぶ。{/n}「聞いたか？何も言うことがないんだよ！奴らも俺たちが正しいことは分かっている！」

languages.text: {n}人群越来越近，“熔炉”放声高喊。{/n}“你们都听到了吗？他们无话可说了！就连他们都知道我们说得没错！”
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"

traits.locale_text: {n}人群越来越近，“熔炉”放声高喊。{/n}“你们都听到了吗？他们无话可说了！就连他们都知道我们说得没错！”

languages.text: {n}La foule s'approche et Fournaise crie à tue-tête :{/n} « Vous entendez ? Ils n'ont rien à dire ! Ils savent que nous sommes dans notre bon droit ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La foule s'approche et Fournaise crie à tue-tête :{/n} « Vous entendez ? Ils n'ont rien à dire ! Ils savent que nous sommes dans notre bon droit ! »

languages.text: {n}Kalabalık yaklaşıyor. Fırın, avazı çıktığı kadar bağırıyor.{/n} "Duyuyor musunuz? Söyleyecek hiçbir şeyleri yok! Haklı olduğumuzu onlar bile biliyorlar!"
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd draws nearer, and Furnace shouts at the top of his lungs,{/n} "Do you hear? They have nothing to say! Even they know we are right!"
